basic_info.description: I'm Akshith Gunasheelan, a Software Engineer who enjoys building fast, reliable and thoughtfully designed user interfaces. I work across modern web technologies, cloud-driven platforms and ML-supported features, and I focus on turning complex requirements into clean, intuitive and performant experiences. My work in UI engineering and platform development has shaped how I approach software: it should be scalable, user-focused and genuinely meaningful to the people who use it. When I’m not deep in code, I love being outdoors, travelling, exploring new places, running marathons and playing sports. Staying active and trying new experiences keeps me balanced and helps me bring fresh energy and perspective into my work.

projects.title: Animal Shelter
projects.description: The most expanded application I had opportunity to work with. I've learned many technologies and my code was reviewed by awesome curator. Application handles all adoption processess and allows to store all evidence on adopting animals from animal shelter.

projects.title: Photography
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. I was responsible for testing photography application that optimizes images with popular algorithms used by graphic editors like Pixlr or Adobe Photoshop. I've earned A grade :)

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!

experience.title: Software Engineer 2
details: Delivered key UI features for HPE Compute Ops Management, from design to release.
Worked closely with backend, UX, and product teams to ship high-quality updates.
Maintained and released HPE OneView SDKs using Jenkins-based CI/CD pipelines.
Enhanced UI architecture, performance, and component reusability.

experience.title: Software Engineer 1
details: Engineered responsive, accessible interfaces for HPE Compute Ops Management while collaborating closely with UX and backend teams.
Delivered core platform features including approval workflows and server-location dashboards using RESTful APIs and OpenStreetMap integrations.
Enhanced data retrieval and search efficiency by designing optimized Amazon OpenSearch–based API endpoints.

experience.title: Research and Development Intern
details: Automated validation and release workflows for HPE OneView SDKs (Python, Ansible, Go, Terraform) using Jenkins and Linux-based CI pipelines.
Developed automation scripts to streamline build, test, and deployment processes, improving release consistency and reducing manual effort.
Contributed to maintaining stable SDK releases by implementing end-to-end checks, debugging issues, and enhancing pipeline reliability.
